alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 7:53PM CST until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Tennessee River at Savannah For the Tennessee River...including Pickwick Dam, Savannah, Saltillo, Perryville, Johnsonville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tennessee River at Savannah. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 371.0 feet, Federal Road is flooded at Lick Creek north of Hamburg. Parts of Lacefield Drive are covered by flood water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 369.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening and continue rising to a crest of 370.9 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 370.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
